story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: We created {{appName}} to solve a problem we experienced ourselves. Our team of passionate developers and designers came together with a vision to make technology more accessible and intuitive.
story.paragraph2: What started as a side project has grown into a powerful tool used by thousands of people worldwide. We're constantly improving and adding new features based on user feedback.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: We believe technology should be fast and responsive, never keeping you waiting

design.title: Design
design.description: Beautiful, intuitive interfaces that make complex tasks feel effortless

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Your data belongs to you. We prioritize security and transparency

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We're here to help!

download.question: How do I download the app?
download.answer: You can download our app from the App Store or Google Play Store. Just search for "{{appName}}" or use the download links on our homepage.

free.question: Is there a free version?
free.answer: Yes! We offer a free tier with core features. You can upgrade to premium anytime for additional features.

bug.question: How can I report a bug?
bug.answer: Use the contact form above or email us directly. Please include details about the issue and your device information.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

book.chooseRetailer: Choose your preferred retailer and format
book.wantReadMore: Want to read more? Download a free sample chapter
book.affiliateNotice: Links marked with * are affiliate links. This means we may earn a commission if you purchase through these links, at no extra cost to you. This helps support our work and allows us to continue providing quality content.

newsletter.title: Get New Release Updates
newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe anytime.
newsletter.exclusiveContent: Exclusive chapters, behind-the-scenes content, and book news delivered to your inbox.
